description: A beautifully crafted amulet with a polished gemstone from the Silverhold mine in the center, surrounded by protective runes.
effect: Grants the wearer a +1 bonus to Constitution saving throws. In addition, once per day, the wearer can use the amulet to dispel magical darkness within 30 feet as a reaction
lore: Blessed by the village clerics after the shadows were defeated, this amulet now serves as a symbol of protection and resilience.
name: Amulet of Silverhold's Ward

description: This finely crafted silver bracelet moves like liquid metal, its surface constantly shifting in gentle waves. Cool to the touch and perfectly fitted to the wearer, it bears faint runes that shimmer and fade like reflections on water, symbolizing grace, balance, and control
effect: Once per long rest, when you use Flurry of Blows, you can push a target an extra 10 feet or gain +2 AC until the start of your next turn.
name: Bracelet of Flowing Silver

description: A pair of black gloves that seem to absorb light. They are slightly cool to the touch and fit the wearer perfectly.
effect: While wearing these gloves, the user gains a +1 to Stealth checks and can pass through any shadow as if it were difficult terrain, allowing them to move more subtly in dim light or darkness. Once per day, they can also blend into shadows, gaining advantage on one Dexterity (Stealth) check.
lore: These gloves were crafted by cultists, giving the wearer a bit of the shadows’ power as a remnant of their dark magic.
name: Gloves of the Shadow Walker

description: A sleek, silver-black dagger with a strange weightlessness to it. When held, the blade absorbs nearby light, seeming to drink in shadows.
effect: This +1 dagger deals an additional 1d6 necrotic damage to creatures vulnerable to radiant or shadow-based damage. Once per day, the wielder can also use the dagger to cast Shadow Blade for 1 minute
lore: Crafted from metals taken from the Silverhold Mine itself, this dagger was forged to banish the shadows and has been imbued with the energy of the demon’s defeat.
name: Shadowforged Dagger

description: Stamped with the crest of Silverhold.
effect: +1 AC while not using a shield
name: Silverhold Signet Ring

description: A thin silver band inlaid with tiny crimson dragon scales.
effect: Gain resistance to fire damage for 1 minute, usable once per long rest. Glows faintly when casting fire spells
name: Ring of Ember Scales

description: Twisted silver inlaid with moonstones, hums faintly under moonlight.
effect: Once per long rest, you can regain one expended 1st-level spell slot.
name: Moonstone Armband

description: Polished silver skull on a silver chain. Whispers faintly near corpses, when the wearer is near dead bodies or spirits, they might hear soft, ghostly murmurs.
effect: Once per long rest, when you deal Sneak Attack damage, deal an additional 1d6 necrotic damage.
name: Silverhold skull pendant

description: A fang from a great wolf, etched with runes. The wearer bonds with the spirit of the hunt.
effect: Once per long rest, when you hit with a weapon attack, roll the damage dice an additional time and add it to the total
name: Wolffang Necklace

description: This pendant has a small silver mirror, polished to a high sheen. The mirror has faint, dark streaks within, reminiscent of shadows moving.
effect: Once per day, the wearer can gain added blindsight for a period of 10 minutes. However, while having added blindsight, the wearer occasionally sees shadowy figures out of the corner of their eye—harmless but eerie remnants of the shadowy presence they banished.
lore: The pendant is enchanted with residual energy from the Shadow Demon, making it a rare and hauntingly beautiful piece.
name: The Silvered Mirror Pendant
